column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Overrated. Food is decent
column2: but definitely not worth the wait. The omelette was ok
column3: but honestly didn't have a lot of flavor. The pancakes were better (the apple pecan ones are good)
column4: but nothing outstanding. Portions are decent but the food is pretty expensive. Service was about what you'd expect for such a busy place. I can't say I'm terribly disappointed
column5: but it's definitely not worth the wait or the price. And even if there weren't a line
column6: I wouldn't come back. Do yourself a favor and skip the tourist trap. This place is overhyped.
